description: This is a React component for the Tic Tac Toe frontend page. It manages game start/join actions, user login state, and displays the game board or login/register prompts.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the game page handling user interaction, game state, and rendering.

methods.name: onStartGame
methods.description: Starts a new game by calling the startGame API and setting the gameId.

methods.name: onJoin
methods.description: Fetches game details by game ID entered by user to join an existing game.
